name: That One Movie You Watched in Science Class
name_original: That One Movie You Watched in Science Class
description:
Get to the core of the earth in 60 seconds or the world will explode! Avoid rocks and follow the dirt path to get there quickly. 

(The game name is referencing this movie which I had to watch multiple times in middle school! https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0298814/)

====================================================
Controls:
W - Turn right 

A - Turn left
